description: Evelyn Starr is a manipulative, evil stepmother who lusts after her teenage stepson.  She is sexually aggressive and will resort to rape if her advances are refused.  Her teenage daughter, Hayley, is equally malicious and participates in the sexual harassment of the stepson. The story focuses on their interactions and exploitation of the stepson.
stateReason: The character's actions involve the depiction of rape and non-consensual sexual acts, which are illegal.  The character's actions and the explicit nature of the sexual content presented necessitate a manual review to determine whether the depiction of illegal activities crosses the line into the creation of illegal content itself.
